 Som integrationsspecialist hos oss bygger du nya API:er i C#/.NET och är väl bevandrad i de tekniker som Azure Integration Services erbjuder. Du tar en ledande roll i leverans och har stor möjlighet att påverka och tycka till gällande olika teknikval – vilket är något som vi både uppmuntrar och uppskattar.
   

  

 Du kommer även att utveckla och underhålla befintliga kundlösningar i förvaltningsåtaganden. Rollen är dynamisk och bjuder på variationsrika och spännande tekniska utmaningar med stora möjligheter att utveckla dina kunskaper och bredda din erfarenhet utifrån dina egna ambitioner.
   

  

 Några exempel på vad du kan komma arbeta med:
   

  

* Designa och skapa integrationslösningar i Microsoft Azure
* Designa och skapa API:er och fasader för integrationer
* Arbeta självständigt i mindre uppdrag
* Leda utvecklingsteam


**Vi söker dig som**
* Under ca 5+ år har jobbat med C# och byggt API:er
* Tycker att CI/CD är lika självklart som att solen går upp varje dag
* Har stor kunskap inom Microsoft Azure utifrån att bygga integrationslösningar
* Är erfaren inom Azure integration services (Logic Apps, Azure functions, API Management, Azure services bus, data factory och event grid)
* Tycker om och har erfarenhet av att bygga komplexa lösningar med fokus på logik
* Är van att jobba och leda i agil scrum-process


**Det är meriterande om du dessutom har**
* Erfarenhet av att arbetat med BizTalk eller liknande integrationsmotor
* Erfarenhet av konsultrollen


 Vem är du?
   

  

 Du är en team-player som antagligen gillar att umgås mycket med dina kollegor. För att lyckas på Accigo är det viktigt att du är kommunikativ, nyfiken och prestigelös.
   

  

 Du är en problemlösare som vågar testa nya tankar, perspektiv och tekniker.
   

  

 Du är en naturlig coach åt andra som förstår skillnaden mellan att ge kritik och konstruktiv feedback. Sist men inte minst, strävar du alltid efter att göra ditt bästa i alla lägen.
   

  

 Vårt team, här är det högt i taket!
   

  

 Vårt affärsområde som vi internt kallar Custom Development & Integration är ett team på 12 medarbetare, var av 11 utvecklare och en affärsledare som mer än ofta är ute hos kunderna och projektleder eller kravställer nya spännande lösningar.
   

  

 För oss är laganda och glädje jätteviktigt och vi ser därför till att hitta på roliga aktiviteter med teamet både på och utanför arbetstid.
   

  

 Det ska vara kul att jobba och alla ska ha möjlighet att utvecklas i linje med sin egen ambition. Det innebär att vi arbetar med många utmanande och spännande projekt i ett lagom tempo. Hos oss är det bara din egen ambition och lust som sätter gränsen för hur mycket du kan utvecklas!
   

  

**Nyfiken?** 
 Vi svarar gärna på frågor, eller berättar mer om oss över en kaffe - du kan enkelt komma i kontakt med oss: elin.yamada@accigo.se
   

  

 Accigo är ett nordiskt konsultbolag som hjälper företag och organisationer med digital affärs- och verksamhetsutveckling med tekniken som möjliggörare. För oss handlar digitalisering till 90% om människor och 10% om teknik. Det är när samspelet mellan människa och teknik fungerar som digitaliseringens fulla styrka visar sig.
   

  

 För många handlar digitalisering mest om teknik. För oss är det så otroligt mycket större. Digitalisering kan få både människor och organisationer att våga sikta högre, följa sina drömmar och öppna dörrar som de inte ens visste fanns. Och när man ser igenom tekniken och börjar skönja vilka möjligheter som gömmer sig där bakom. Då ser man att framtiden kan vara en fantastisk plats – fylld av mänsklig energi och värme – och digitalisering är inget annat än vår superkraft för att komma dit.

title: Quality Engineer
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Business Consulting and Services
description:
**Jobbeskrivning**
*Vill du jobba i uppdrag där kvalitet, teknik och affärsvärde hänger ihop – på riktigt? Hos oss får du kombinera din tekniska förmåga med strategiskt ansvar, i team där kvalitet ses som en självklar del av utvecklingen.*
 Som QA-konsult/Quality Engineer på Sopra Steria har du en nyckelroll i att säkerställa att våra kunders digitala lösningar håller hög kvalitet – både tekniskt och ur användarperspektiv. Du ansvarar för att ta fram teststrategier, bygga upp testautomation, sätta strukturer och coacha team kring kvalitet. Du arbetar nära utvecklare, produktägare och verksamhet i agila team där du bidrar till att skapa spårbarhet, testbarhet och datadrivna beslut.
   

  

 Våra kunder har höga krav på kvalitet – vilket innebär att du sällan behöver övertyga om varför test behövs. Istället får du samarbeta med andra som förstår och värdesätter det du gör, och där din tekniska kompetens verkligen kommer till sin rätt.
   

  

**Vi tror att du har:**
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet som QA-konsult/Quality Engineer eller liknande
* Vana att skriva kod – t.ex. i Java, JavaScript eller Python.
* Erfarenhet av moderna test- och automatiseringsverktyg (t.ex. Cypress, Playwright, Selenium).
* Förmåga att ta fram teststrategier och coacha andra kring kvalitet i agila team.
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.


**Det är meriterande om du även har:**
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD-pipelines och automatiserade byggprocesser.
* Jobbat med containerteknik som Docker och Kubernetes.
* Testledarerfarenhet eller ansvar för större kvalitetsstrategier.


 Det viktigaste för oss är att du har ett tekniskt driv och en stark förståelse för hur kvalitet påverkar både kod, affär och användarupplevelse.
   

  

**Varför välja Sopra Steria?**
 I vårt Quality-team är vi över 30 QA-konsulter, kravanalytiker och UX-designers som gillar att dela kunskap, hjälpas åt och ligga i teknikens framkant. Vi tror på frihet under ansvar och värnar om balans mellan arbete och fritid. Kompetensutveckling är en självklar del av din vardag – både genom interna initiativ och utbildningar. Hos oss får du möjlighet att bidra till samhällsnytta, samtidigt som du är en del av ett bolag som rankas som en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser enligt Great Place to Work. Och du får kollegor som brinner för kvalitet, teknik – och riktigt bra fika till kaffet!
   

  

**Låter det som din nästa utmaning?**
 Skicka ansök direkt med CV och/eller LinkedIn-profil – vi rekryterar löpande! Har du frågor? Hör av dig till Hanna Korell på
 **hanna.korell@soprasteria.com** 
 .
   

  

 På Sopra Steria ställer vi höga krav på både kompetens och säkerhetsmedvetenhet hos våra medarbetare. Innan en eventuell anställning kommer du därför att genomgå en bakgrundskontroll, och vid intervju behöver du kunna uppvisa giltig legitimation.
   

  

 Processen består av tre intervjuer och personlighets- och logiktest, samt referenstagning och bakgrundskontroll
   

  

 📍
 **Placering:** 
 Stockholm (hybrid)
   

  

 ⏳
 **Omfattning:** 
 Heltid
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
   

  

**Ytterligare information**
 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: Senior Fullstackutvecklare med fokus på backend
description:
**Företagsbeskrivning**
 AFRY är ett ledande europeiskt företag med global räckvidd inom teknik, design och rådgivning. Vi accelererar omställningen mot ett hållbart samhälle.
   

  

 Vi är 19 000 hängivna experter inom industri, energi och digitalisering, som skapar hållbara lösningar för kommande generationer.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**

 till ett långsiktigt uppdrag inom fordonsbranschen.

 , med start under hösten 2025. Här får du möjlighet att bidra med din expertis i ett team som värdesätter innovation, kvalitet och samarbete.
   

  

 Uppdraget innebär arbete med moderna tekniker och verktyg, där du får möjlighet att bidra med din expertis inom

 . Ju mer senior du är, desto bättre – vi söker dig som kan ta ett stort ansvar och bidra till helheten.

* Djup kompetens inom Python och AWS
* Gärna erfarenhet av Java

* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt och ta ansvar i komplexa systemmiljöer

 Vi erbjuder:
   

  

* Ett spännande och långsiktigt uppdrag i teknikens framkant

 .
   

  

 Uppdraget

 . Därför är

 .
   

  

 Låter det intressant? Tveka inte att höra av dig – vi ser fram emot att få veta mer om dig!
   

  

**Plats:** 
 Stockholm, Sverige

 September 2025
   

  

**Placering:** 
 Stockholm

 Enligt överenskommelse

 Heltid
   

  

**Kontaktperson för frågor:**
**Maja Lindqvist**
 Recruitment Partner
   

  

 maja.lindqvist@afry.com
   

  

*På AFRY driver vi förändring i allt vi gör. Vi anser att förändring sker när modiga idéer möts, när vi samarbetar, skapar innovation och omfamnar kreativa lösningar, det är så vi skapar framtiden. Vi söker konstant kvalificerade kandidater som vill ansluta sig till våra inkluderande team runt om i världen. Bli en del av oss och påskynda den gröna omställningen*

title: SAP Integrationskonsult
company_industry: Information Technology & Services, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Professional Services
description:
SAP BTP, integrationer och andra spännande teknikmöjligheter, här är du som bäst!
   

  

 Vårt team av utvecklare har bred kunskap inom SAP BTP (Business Technology Platform) och Fiori och söker nu fler kollegor främst inom integrationsområdet.
   

  

 Som SAP Integrationsexpert kommer du att arbeta direkt med våra kunder för att designa, implementera och stödja integrationslösningar som kopplar samman SAP- och icke-SAP-system. Du kommer att arbeta nära kunden för att förstå och analysera deras integrationsbehov och utveckla skräddarsydda lösningar med hjälp av SAP BTP Integration Suite.
   

  

 Om du har en bakgrund inom rådgivning eller konsulting och brinner för att hjälpa företag att optimera sina integrationslösningar är detta din chans att göra en verklig skillnad!
   

  

 Bli en del av vårt dynamiska team och hjälp oss att driva innovation och framgång.
   

  

**Om Stretch Evolve**
 Med slutanvändaren i fokus och innovation som drivkraft skapar vi framtiden. Vi utgår från SAP:s Cloud lösningar, guidar och coachar våra kunder genom hela den utvecklande livscykeln. Tillsammans har vi kompetensen, erfarenheten och dessutom en extra spets inom S/4HANA, SAP BTP, Fiori, SAP Analytics Cloud, UX och förändringsledning, vilket gör att vi kan säkerställa största möjliga utväxling för våra kunder i de initiativ vi är involverade i. Här kan du göra skillnad!
   

  

 Nyfiken på att bli en del av vårt SAP team?
   

  

**Vi Tror Att Du**
* har praktisk erfarenhet av att designa, bygga och testa integrationer mellan SAP och andra system/applikationer för både on-premise och hybrida Cloud lösningar
* har erfarenhet av att integrationsmonitorering, felhantering och lösa problem kopplat till integrationslösningar
* har minst 3 års erfarenhet av SAP Integration Suite, fd SAP CPI (Cloud Platform Integration)
* har erfarenhet av REST API:er, API utveckling, API Management
* har minst 1 års erfarenhet av att leda och driva integrationsprojekt
* är självgående, analytisk, strukturerad, proaktiv, lösningsorienterad
* erfarenhet av att arbeta direkt med kunder och en förmåga att skapa starka kundrelationer
* behärskar svenska språket


**Någon eller några av nedan erfarenheter hjälper dig att lyckas i denna roll:**
* Erfarenhet av SAP PO/PI/XI
* Relevanta SAP-certifieringar, såsom SAP Certified Application Associate - SAP Integration Associate, är en fördel


 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Hälsar teamet på Stretch Evolve

title: E-commerce Multimedia Designer
description:
**Take your career to the next level by joining a leading eCommerce company that's redefining the industry for a greener and happier planet. With an extensive array of stores across diverse niches and countries, we offer limitless opportunities where ambition fuels success.**

 **Discover your path to eCommerce freedom with us!**

 **The Company in a Nutshell**


GTEcom BV was established in 2018 and headquartered in The Netherlands. Our mission is to continue scaling our operations and opening & sustaining more successful global brands to achieve our target of $500M revenue and more than 50 stores worldwide by 2027. Our diverse team of 150 and growing remote e-commerce experts in their own niches from different parts of the world is helping us transform our vision of growing the company to a reality.


We are committed to cultivating a culture of hard work, freedom and responsibility, constant improvement, and positivity in our team.

 **The Upsides of Working with Us**

* Thrive in a results-driven environment with the autonomy to shape your own approach
* Achieve a great work-life balance with remote work and flexible schedule
* Enjoy a competitive salary that reflects your skills and contributions
* Collaborate with a dynamic remote team
* Be a key player in our rapidly growing company

 **We’re on the lookout for an E-commerce Multimedia Designer** **to join our expanding team and drive our company’s growth!**

 **The Challenge**


We are seeking an E-commerce Multimedia Designer with a focus on digital design and substantial experience in the e-commerce industry. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing and producing compelling visual content, including product pages, landing pages, banners, Google Ads and Facebook Ads creatives, and email marketing assets. You will collaborate with various teams to bring creative ideas to life and enhance user experience, ultimately contributing to business growth.

 **Day in the Life of an E-commerce Multimedia Designer at GT Ecom**

* Design and optimize visual content for e-commerce platforms to enhance user experience and drive conversion rate uplift.
* Develop high-quality product pages, landing pages, banners, and digital media (Google & Facebook) ad creatives.
* Create eye-catching and effective email marketing creatives to engage and convert customers.
* Utilize Figma and Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) for design tasks, ensuring consistency and quality across all platforms.
* Leverage AI-powered graphic and video creation tools to improve design efficiency and creativity.
* Collaborate with other team members using Google Suite (Docs, Sheets, Slides, Forms, Gmail) for seamless project management and communication.
* Stay up-to-date with the latest design trends, tools, and best practices in the e-commerce space.

 **We would love to hear from you if…**

* At least 2 years of professional experience in digital design, specifically within an e-commerce environment.
* Proven experience in designing for e-commerce platforms, including product pages, landing pages, banners, Google Ads, Facebook Ads creatives, and email marketing materials.
* Advanced proficiency in Figma and Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).
* Proven experience in video creation & editing (for short form videos)
* Competence in AI-powered graphic and video creation tools.
* Familiarity with Google Suite (Docs, Sheets, Slides, Forms, Gmail) for collaboration and project management.
* Excellent communication and teamwork skills with the ability to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment.
* A keen eye for detail, creativity, and problem-solving abilities.

 **Preferred Skills:**

* Experience with direct-to-consumer (DTC) e-commerce businesses.
* Familiarity with website optimization tools and conversion rate optimization techniques.
* Knowledge of UX/UI principles for e-commerce platforms.

  

If you are excited about the opportunity and feel like you are a good fit, we encourage you to apply today and talk to one of our recruiters. We look forward to seeing how your skills and experiences align with our vision. If unsure, we still welcome your application and would be happy to discuss other potential roles that may be a good fit for you.

 **Overview of Our Interview Process**



* **Application Submission** - We’ll start by reviewing your application.


* **Initial Contact** - Our Recruiter will reach out to you to discuss the next steps

	+ Written Assessment - You will take a 10-minute test

	+ Initial Interview - To be conducted by one of our recruiters if you passed the Written Assessment.
* **Final Interview**

	+ Meet with the Hiring Manager
* **Offer Discussion** - If all goes well, we'll discuss the offer and invite you to our pre-onboarding process.


* **Pre-Onboarding Process**

	+ **Background Check:** Verification of your identification and declared address.

	+ **Reference Check:** We’ll contact your three references for their feedback.
* **Onboarding:** Once all checks are completed, we’ll initiate the onboarding process.

title: UX DESIGNER
description:
**FÖRETAG**


Stena Recycling Group

**PLATS**


Göteborg, Sverige

**SISTA ANSÖKNINGSDATUM**


2025-06-15

**YRKESOMRÅDE**


Business



  
We are looking for a passionate UX designer who will be an important part of our Sales & Marketing Domain within Business Digital. It starts with you!



You will take on an active role in improving the end-user experience of our digital products and services. You consult with stakeholders to better understand their needs and goals, conduct usability testing, create digital product prototypes, and conduct user analyses. You understand what drives people to take the actions they do and learn from that information to create a seamless and satisfying user experience.



As part of the product teams, you will help build and continuously improve digital products for the logged-in customer at Stena Recycling Group, always by putting customer and user experience at the center. With digital technology you will help drive growth and revenue as an addition to the traditional business.


**Meet the team!**



We are three product teams that together develop Stena Recycling's customer portal - a service used by thousands of customers in five countries. You will work closely with our product owners: Lars, Johan and Karolina - and become an important part of a UX team that, together with the developers, drives the agile work forward to provide Stena's customers with digital services and the best possible user experience. We want to both deliver value and have fun along the way. We are located at the top of Stena Metal's building, with a relaxed atmosphere and space for both work focus and ping pong matches. With us, you will have plenty of space to understand the users' needs and translate them into prototypes and sharp design. We look forward to meeting you!


**Using your potential, you will:**


* Conduct user research in order to understand user needs
* Develop wireframes and prototypes around customer needs
* Design intuitive interaction flows and ensuring usability
* Collaborate in cross-functional teams to implement designs
* Continuously test, iterate and improve user experience
* Develop user journeys and other user-centered artifacts to illustrate insights and guide design decisions
* Keep up to date with industry trends


**It starts with you!**

We are seeking a UX designer who is/has:


* Problem-solving attitude
* Interested in being part of the circular economy and enjoys working in dynamic teams centering around innovation and digital acceleration
* A team player with great communication skills in both Swedish and English, verbally and written
* Action oriented with delivery focus and a can-do attitude.
* Curious, empathetic, asks insightful questions, listens to and acts on feedback to ensure the end-user has a pleasant experience.


You also have:


* BSc in Design, Computer Science, Engineering or a related field
* Proven experience as a UX Designer or similar role
* Proficient in Figma design software or similar
* A strong portfolio of design projects
* Knowledge with interaction design, information architecture and data visualization
* Experience with project management and research

  
**ANSÖKAN**
-----------


Hope we have caught your attention. Join our ride today and help us, by using your potential, to make a difference and form a sustainable tomorrow! We look forward to your application as soon as possible, selection will be running continuously. We do background check in the recrutmentprocess  

  

**Sista ansökningsdatum:**  

2025-06-15
Vill du veta mer?
Om du har frågor om denna specifika tjänst är du välkommen att kontakta oss. För allmän information om hur det är att arbeta för Stena Metallkoncernen, besök vår karriärsida.


**CHRISTINA JOHANSSON**
Rekryteringsspecialist

**010 445 8613**
**DATASKYDDSDEKLARATION**
-------------------------


Stena Metall AB har åtagit sig att skydda och respektera din integritet. Vi vill att du ska känna dig trygg när vi behandlar dina personuppgifter. För att säkerställa en hög skyddsnivå för de personuppgifter du delar med oss kommer vi inte att behandla de ansökningar som skickas till oss via e-post. Skicka in din ansökan enligt instruktionerna.

title: Senior React Engineer
description:
May 27, 2025
Hybrid
Sweden

title: Business Analyst
description:
* **Job ID:** R0011668
* **Date posted:** 27/05/2025
* We are on the journey to transform our digital capabilities, bringing core business processes, people, data & technology together - an enabler for IKEA to become an even better home furnishing retailer in the future. A journey that needs passionate people who embrace change, dare to question and want to make a difference. If that sounds like you, come and join us. Together we can do great things!
* **About the area**
* Our vision, to create a better everyday life for the many people, influences everything we do. It is a vision that lives in the everyday efforts of all co-workers, all over the world.
* Fulfilling the IKEA vision requires a strong, efficient, and sustainable business setup. That is why it is built on a franchise system. The IKEA Franchisor, Inter IKEA Systems B.V., is the worldwide owner of the IKEA Concept and has the responsibility to ensure that the IKEA Concept stays attractive and competitive while enabling growth and a profitable business for IKEA franchisees.
* Retail Operation Solutions & Support is an integral part of Inter IKEA Retail Concept and consists of a team of people with a passion for retail and competence in business and technology. We are moving into a new chapter with an ambition to provide IKEA retailers with a set of digital products and services that are integrated into the IKEA value chain and support the omnichannel IKEA Concept. We call this the Core offer and it covers key capabilities for retail operations.
* **About you**
* **Experience:**
* + 3–5+ years of experience as a Business Analyst in a digital product environment.
* + Proven background in agile methodologies.
* + Experience working in product teams, collaborating closely with Product Owners, Developers, UX, and SMEs.
* + Familiarity with enterprise-scale platforms (e.g., ERP like D365 F&O, retail systems, or e-commerce platforms).
* + Understanding of retail processes and customer journeys is a strong advantage.
* **Skills:**
* **Core Business Analysis Skills**
* + Strong in requirements elicitation, refinement, and documentation (e.g., Epics, Features, User Stories).
* + Skilled in process mapping
* + Ability to translate high-level business needs into product backlog items and break it down to sizeable work item
* **Agile & Product Thinking**
* + Deep understanding of Agile mindset and iterative delivery.
	+ Familiarity with product life cycle, MVP thinking, and experimentation.
* + Works collaboratively with cross-functional product teams.
* **Soft Skills**
* + Strong stakeholder management and communication skills.
	+ Proactive, structured, and a problem-solver.
	+ Comfortable navigating ambiguity and making sense of complex environments.
* + Capable of influencing without authority
* **Tools Knowledge**
* + Tools like Jira, Confluence, Miro, and analytics tools
	+ D365 F&O, or other retail/finance systems is a plus.
* **About the job**
* + Act as the link between business and product teams, ensuring clear understanding of value, needs, and priorities.
* + Work closely with the team to shape and refine the product backlog, ensuring readiness for development.
* + Support discovery by identifying business problems, opportunities for value, and customer impact.
* + Facilitate requirements workshops, interviews, and process analysis with stakeholders.
* + Help define acceptance criteria and validate outcomes against requirements.
* + Contribute to the definition of OKRs.
* + Work across multiple stakeholders including markets, retail, operations, finance, and other product/platform teams.
* At IKEA, we are looking for people who believe everyone deserves a seat at the table. You’re welcome no matter where you come from, what you believe, and what you look like. We don’t even care how you have furnished your home. We’re interested in you simply because you’re you. Even if your experience doesn’t align perfectly with every qualification in the job description, we encourage you to apply anyway. We believe that people’s different perspectives, backgrounds, and personalities make us better at understanding our customers dreams and needs. At IKEA, we’re all on the same project.  

  

If you have a special need that requires accommodation in the recruitment process, just let us know.
 **More Information*** This is a full-time role (40 hours per week) located in Malmö, Sweden. You will report to a domain Product Manager, Retail Operations Solution & Support, Retail Concept, Inter IKEA.
* You might have some questions about the recruitment process, and we are more than happy to answer those! Feel free to connect with our Recruiter – Sarah Arshad sarah.arshad@inter.ikea.com.
* Interested? Submit your CV, in English, by 09 June 2025.
company_description: At IKEA, we share an inspiring vision: “to create a better everyday life for the many people”.

title: Senior UX-designer automation – Kiruna
description:
Modernera är ett modernt företag inom rekrytering och bemanning. Besök oss på www.modernera.se.
  
För en av våra kunders räkning söker vi nu en senior UX-designer. Vår kund är ett väletablerat konsultbolag med stark ekonomi. Företaget erbjuder intressanta uppdrag inom offentlig sektor, med fokus på samhällsnyttiga tillämpningar, samt en trygg anställning med kollektivavtal. Företaget har varit verksam sedan 2003 och har idag cirka 100 medarbetare.
  
Du kommer att arbeta i trevliga lokaler i centrala Kiruna, med alternativet att även jobba hemifrån.
  
Som senior UX-designer blir din roll att tillsammans med andra automationsexperter hjälpa företagets offentliga kunder i deras förflyttning till en effektivare ärendehantering som frigör tid för värdeskapande arbete och leder till förbättrad kvalitet, högre rättssäkerhet och nöjdare medborgare och medarbetare.
  
  

**Vi söker dig som:**  

* har minst 5 års erfarenhet av UX-rollen i olika digitala utvecklingsprojekt
* kan utföra user research, kravanalys, ta fram koncept, wireframes, prototyper, visuell design eller göra användartester
* kan arbeta självständigt och gillar att arbeta i team med våra kunder
* har goda kunskaper i svenska
* har eftergymnasial utbildning kopplat till UX


**Du får:**  

* intressanta uppdrag med samhällsnyttiga tillämpningar
* en anställning på ett företag med stabila kundrelationer och goda samarbeten
* balans mellan arbete och fritid
* en individuell kompetensutveckling som är unik för dig och din karriärbana
* en trygg anställning med kollektivavtal och attraktiva förmåner
* en lönemodell som kombinerar anställningstrygghet med rörlig kompensation och vinstdelning
* en platt organisation med nära till ledningen och stor möjlighet till inflytande


Du kommer att bli anställd direkt hos vår kund, på heltid. Provanställningen övergår till en tillsvidareanställning efter sex månader. Tillträde: omgående.
  
Ansök genom att skicka ditt CV och personligt brev till info@modernera.se. Skriv ”Senior UX-designer automation – Kiruna” i ämnesraden.

title: Gruppchef till Fordonssystem
description:
Vill du leda utvecklingen av IT-stödet i polisbilarna och därmed bidra till att poliserna i yttre tjänst har bästa tänkbara förutsättningar att utföra sitt uppdrag? Är du redo för en större uppgift Välkommen med din ansökan!
  

  

Som gruppchef kommer du att ha din placering centralt på Kungsholmen i Stockholm, och tillhöra den drygt 1300 personer starka IT-avdelningen som arbetar sida vid sida med de i polisverksamheten som använder lösningarna. IT-avdelningen är helt avgörande för att Polisen ska klara sitt uppdrag nu och i framtiden. I takt med att digitaliseringen ökar måste Polisen kunna hantera allt större datamängder, dra nytta av nya teknologier och ligga steget före de kriminella, utan att kompromissa med säkerhet och rättssäkerhet.  

  

Som statligt anställd på Polismyndigheten erbjuder vi särskilda förmåner kring pension, föräldralön, friskvård m.m. Läs mer om våra förmåner och villkor här: polisen.se/jobb-och-utbildning/polisen-som-arbetsplats/det-har-erbjuder-vi/
  

  

Gruppen Fordonssystem organiseras inom sektionen Sensorsystem och ingår i enheten Operativa verksamhetssystem, enheten har helhetsansvar för att leverera IT-stöd till den polisära operativa verksamheten b.la. till poliser i yttre tjänst, kameratekniska förmågor, system till ledningscentraler, och radio samt övrigt IT-stöd inom trafikområdet.
**Arbetsbeskrivning**
---------------------


Verksamhetsuppdraget som gruppchef för Fordonssystem  

  

Gruppen Fordonssystem arbetar med utveckling av IT-system knutet till nya generationens polisbilar. Vi har en modern och världsunik IT-plattform som utvecklas till att bli ett kraftfullt redskap i polisens förmåga att förebygga, utreda och lagföra brott. Vi är just nu inne i en expansiv fas med flertal pågående uppdrag, b.la. utvecklar vi tekniska förmågor runt videoinspelning, radarfunktionalitet för hastighetsavläsning samt automatisk avläsning av registreringsskyltar (ANPR).
  

  

Våra system är egenutvecklade, och inkluderar allt ifrån apputveckling och fullstack-webbutveckling till maskinnära utveckling baserat på C/C++. Vi arbetar i nära samverkan med den polisiära operativa verksamheten, där vi står inför en tid med stora leveranser och ny teknik, vilket kommer att innebära en arbetsvardag präglad av idégenerering samt kreativa och tekniska utmaningar.
  

  

Din roll innebär både att vara formell gruppchef med personal- och budgetansvar, men även att vara produktägare och säkerställa att de produkter som du ansvarar för utvecklas och förvaltas enligt strategier och mål som är överenskomna med verksamheten. Gruppen består idag av cirka 15 medarbetare, som har kompetenser kring b.la. systemutveckling, apputveckling, UX/kravanalys, uppdragsledning och teknisk testning.
  

  

Som chef för gruppen Fordonssystem rapporterar du till sektionschef samt ingår i sektionens ledningsgrupp, där ni tillsammans ansvarar för att uppdrag genomförs samt att driva myndighetens förändrings- och utvecklingsarbete. Du har särskilt ansvar för gruppens verksamhet inom området och dess resultat. Som gruppchef företräder du hela Polismyndigheten både internt och externt samt arbetar för att stärka förtroendet för polisverksamheten.  

  

Att vara chef och ledare inom Polismyndigheten innebär att skapa trygghet och bygga förtroende genom att utöva ett uppriktigt, modigt och lyhört ledarskap med tillit till andras kompetens och förmåga. Som chef driver du utveckling genom att inspirera och uppmuntra till reflektion och återkoppling på ett sätt som utgår från att vi följer lagen och behandlar människor lika. Du skapar förutsättningar och verkar för goda relationer som bidrar till att vi agerar tillsammans utifrån vad som är bäst för medborgarna och uppdraget som helhet.
**Kvalifikationer**
-------------------


Detta är en möjlighet för dig som har:  

* för funktionen relevant examen/utbildning
* minst 6 månaders sammanhängande erfarenhet av att ha arbetat som chef med personalansvar i närtid
* erfarenhet (i närtid) av aktuellt verksamhetsområde
* erfarenhet av att delta i förändrings- och utvecklingsarbeten
* ingått i ledningsforum
* mycket goda kunskaper i svenska, både i tal och skrift
  

Vi ser det som meriterande om du utöver detta har:  
* erfarenhet av att leda andra mot uppsatta mål och resultat
* erfarenhet av polisorganisationens verksamhet
* chefs- och ledarskapsutbildning för direkt, indirekt och/eller strategisk nivå
  

När vi anställer kommer vi att lägga stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper och ledarskapsförmågor.
  

Som grund för den bedömningen ligger Polismyndighetens ledarkriterier. Ledarkriterierna anger en beskrivning av ett önskvärt ledarskap inom Polismyndigheten och omfattar följande förmågor:  
* Analys och helhetssyn
* Mål och resultat
* Utveckling och förändring
* Social säkerhet
* Muntlig och skriftlig kommunikation
* Skapa delaktighet och motivation

  

Läs mer om ledarkriterierna polisen.se/ledarkriterier/ Om inte länken är klickbar kopiera och klistra in länktexten i din webbläsare. Som en del i urvalsprocessen kommer även tester att användas.
**Kontaktpersoner**
-------------------


Kimberly Uvelid, HR- konsult  

kimberly.uvelid@polisen.se  

  

Har du frågor om uppdraget? Välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef, tfn: 010-564 0391
**Fackliga företrädare**
------------------------


Polisförbundet, Sofia Ask, tfn: 010-563 87 10. SACO, nås via mejl saco-s.avdelningarna@polisen.se. SEKO Polisen, Karna Tillheden, tfn: 010-561 66 27. ST, Jessica Stålenkrans 010-563 32 66
**Övrig information**
---------------------


Arbetsort: Stockholm  

Arbetstid: Förtroendearbetstid  

Tillträde: Enligt överneskommelse  

Funktion: Gruppchef  

Anställningsbenämning: Handläggare/Polisinspektör  

  

Ansök genom att bifoga ditt CV (vi vill inte ha något personligt brev) och besvara urvalsfrågorna. Frågorna utgår från kravprofilen för den här rekryteringen och dina svar ligger till grund för det urval som sker i processen. Att besvara frågorna är en förutsättning för att din ansökan ska anses komplett.  

  

Vänligen notera att krav och eventuella meriter ska vara uppfyllda vid ansökningstillfället.
  

  

Vi använder e-rekrytering för att effektivisera och kvalitetssäkra rekryteringsarbetet. Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via Polisens rekryteringsstöd Visma Recruit.
  

  

Har du skyddade personuppgifter, referenser eller liknande information som du själv bedömer som skyddsvärd rekommenderar vi att du kontaktar ansvarig HR-konsult innan du går vidare med din ansökan.  

  

Om du vill komplettera din ansökan vänder du dig till ansvarig HR-konsult.  

  

En anställning hos Polismyndigheten kan komma att inledas med en provanställning om sex månader.  

  

Polismyndigheten är Sveriges största myndighet. Vi erbjuder dig en arbetsplats som stimulerar till mångfald, kreativitet och personlig utveckling.  

Läs gärna om våra förmåner som anställd hos polisen på: polisen.se/erbjudande  

Vi bedriver vår verksamhet enligt vår värdegrund: engagemang, effektivitet och tillgänglighet. Som medarbetare inom polisen agerar du för likabehandling. Det är en förutsättning för rättssäkerhet, rättstrygghet och för polisens legitimitet i samhället. Som företrädare för polisen respekterar du allas lika värde och skapar förtroende för polisen.  

  

Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!  

  

Vi undanber oss samtal och mail från dig som vill sälja annons- och rekryteringstjänster.

title: RAN DIGITAL TWIN RESEARCHER
description:
**About Ericsson Research**
---------------------------



Ericsson Research develops new communication solutions and standards. The organization is responsible for providing Ericsson with world-class system concepts, technology innovations, and research methodology.

**About this Opportunity:**
---------------------------


Network digital twins are a transformative tool in research for future radio access networks and applications. They enable simulations of 5G-Advanced and 6G network performance with unprecedented accuracy, allowing for illustrative visualization of performance metrics at both the network and consumer level in ways that were previously impossible. This powerful technology offers new insights into the capabilities and potential of modern networks.

  

In this role, you'll focus on creating cutting edge digital representations of physical environments—like buildings and streets—and simulating the interactions of radio networks and user devices within these spaces. You'll leverage state of the art tools and technologies to refine and automate our digital twin pipeline, transforming complex data into actionable insights.

  

From generating and synchronizing network digital twins using diverse data sources to visualizing and analyzing results, you'll be at the forefront of technological advancement and contribute to Ericsson’s technology strategy. You will collaborate with industry experts and use cutting-edge solutions to make a tangible impact on network modeling and analysis.

 ***If you're passionate about innovation and eager to contribute to transformative projects, we want you on our team!***

**What you will do**
--------------------

* Ensure technology leadership and profitable business for Ericsson by contributing to Ericsson’s RAN digital twins modelling tools and performance evaluations.
* Identify new opportunities for state-of-the-art RAN simulations and implement solutions to enable best practice evaluations of use cases and scenarios (e.g. data-driven, 3D modelling, visualizations, industry platforms).
* Communicate results, a very important aspect of the work we do.
**Skills you bring**
--------------------


* PhD or MSc in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent.
* Strong expertise in software engineering, programming with Python or other languages.
* Proficiency in packaging and distributing software using Python, including experience with creating and maintaining Python packages, managing dependencies, and handling version control and releases.
* DevOps, testing, git, AWS, Linux, CI/CD, 3D, UI/UX, APIs, data visualization, rendering, geodata knowledge.
* Knowledge of wireless communication, mathematical modelling, and radio network simulations is meriting.
* Experience from research or development of simulation/evaluation tools in any scientific field are considered valuable merits.

 **As a person you are:**

* Interested in putting together pipelines and tools to incorporate the latest technologies into our simulation flows.
* Having an artistic and creative side is a bonus for this position, where novel 3D visualizations of results to customers and stakeholders is a key component. Experience from Pixar USD is of special interest.
* Excellent networking, collaboration, communication and innovation skills with high energy and motivation.
* Curiosity and passion about trying new things and breaking new ground.
* Enthusiasm for programming with a purpose, aiming to improve functionality and efficiency.
**Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Stockholm

**Req ID:** 767503
company_description: Do you want to be part of shaping the future? From making connectivity more accessible to the latest IoT solutions, you have an opportunity to be where it begins.

title: UX/UI Designer
description:
At Bending Spoons, we’re striving to build one of the all-time great companies. A company that serves a huge number of customers. A company where team members grow to their full potential. A company that functions at unparalleled levels of effectiveness and efficiency. A company that creates value for shareowners at an extraordinary rate. And a company that does so while adhering to high ethical standards.
   

  

 To achieve this objective, we execute the following strategy: We acquire a digital business with untapped potential and make it as successful as we can by leveraging our platform—which comprises our expertise, technologies, data, brand, talents, and company culture. Then, we invest the proceeds into making our platform more powerful, and into acquiring new businesses. Thus, our strategy sees us combine an investor’s attention to capital allocation with the hands-on approach of an operator.
   

  

 For a talented, driven, and collaborative individual, working at Bending Spoons is an opportunity to learn, make an impact, and progress their career at an exceptionally high rate. That’s our promise to such a candidate.
   

  

**A few examples of your responsibilities** 
* Help shape outstanding user experiences and impact the success of our products by creating flawless UI and UX designs, from conceptualization to delivery. You’ll take a human-first approach to designing products, ensuring they delight users by being as effective as they are aesthetically pleasing.
* Make use of prototyping tools to ensure your designs are intuitive and to explore new, innovative ways of designing interactions.
* Work closely with product managers and software engineers to propose new features and improve the quality of both mobile and desktop apps.
* Focus on user testing and research to ensure our customers are always at the core of our product designs.
* Find, together with engineers, the most efficient trade-off between high-value solutions for users and the complexity of implementation.
* Leverage usage data to evaluate the impact of your designs, and apply your learnings to the next iterations.


**What we look for** 
* **Reasoning ability.** 
 Given the necessary knowledge, you can solve complex problems. You think from first principles, and structure your ideas sharply. You resist the influence of biases. You identify and take care of the details that matter.
* **Drive.** 
 You’re extremely ambitious in everything you do—and your initiative, effort, and tenacity match the intensity of your ambition. You feel deeply responsible for your work. You hold yourself to a high—and rising—bar.
* **Team spirit.** 
 You give generously and without the expectation of receiving in return. You support the best idea, not your idea. You're always happy to get your hands dirty to help your team. You’re reliable, honest, and transparent.
* **Proficiency in English.** 
 You read, write, and speak proficiently in English.


**What we offer** 
* **Incredibly talented, entrepreneurial teams.** 
 You’ll work in small, result-oriented, autonomous teams alongside some of the brightest people in your field.
* **An exceptional opportunity for growth.** 
 We go to great lengths to hire individuals of outstanding potential—then, our priority is to put them in the ideal position to thrive. Spooners in their 20s lead products worth hundreds of millions of dollars. And if you’ve got what it takes, you’ll soon be playing an essential role in major projects, too.
* **Competitive pay and access to equity in the company.** 
 Typically, we offer an individual at the start of their career a salary of £54,545 in the UK and €52,246 elsewhere. If they possess a few years of relevant experience, the salary on offer tends to be between £66,779 and £149,636 in the UK, and €63,965 and €143,330 elsewhere. Pay grows rapidly as you accumulate experience and translate it into greater impact. You can also receive some of your pay in company equity at a discounted price, thus participating in the value creation we achieve together. If relocating to Italy, you may enjoy a 50% tax cut.
* **All. These. Benefits.** 
 Flexible hours, remote working, unlimited backing for learning and training, top-of-the-market health insurance, a rich relocation package, generous parental support, and a yearly retreat to a stunning location. We help each Spooner set up the conditions to do their best work.


**Commitment & contract**
 Permanent or fixed-term. Full-time.
   

  

**Location**
 Milan (Italy), London (UK) or remote.
   

  

**Before you apply**
 Bending Spoons is a demanding environment: We're extremely ambitious and we ask a lot of ourselves and one another. While this tends to lead to fantastic learning, achievements, and career growth, it also requires a significant commitment. So if you like the role and are ready to give your very best, don't hesitate to apply.
   

  

**The selection process**
 If you pass our screening, we’ll ask you to take on a few tests that assess how you approach unfamiliar problems. If you’re successful with those, we’ll invite you to a series of interviews.
   

  

 Bending Spoons is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. We consider for employment any applicant and we provide reasonable accommodations for an applicant with disabilities, which can be requested through this form.
   

  

 Studies suggest that women tend not to apply for a job if their CV isn’t a perfect fit. Here, talent takes precedence over experience. So if you like the role and think you could be awesome at it in time, go ahead and apply.

title: Graphic Designer / Art Director
description:
**Are you a design-driven creative with a passion for striking visuals and impactful storytelling?** 




  





 We’re Twain Studios – a product and creative design studio based in Stockholm. We define, design, and build consumer experiences for our clients across every touchpoint - from physical environments to digital interactions. Our ethos? Simplicity over complexity, creativity over convention, and always having fun along the way. At Twain Studios, every team member plays a vital role. We’re a team of talented and friendly individuals who value 
 **speed, user focus, collaboration, curiosity, and ownership** 
 .
 



  





 We’re currently looking for a 
 **Graphic Designer / Art Director** 
  to join us on a major engagement with one of our largest multinational clients in the retail sector.
 



  





**What you’ll do** 




  




* Create compelling 
 **retail marketing** 
  concepts and 
 **in-store merchandising** 
  materials that drive engagement and elevate brand presence
* Participate in the design process from 
 **brief to production** 
  – including mock-ups, layout design, and overseeing final artwork
* Work hands-on with 
 **Adobe InDesign** 
  (and Illustrator/Photoshop) to craft beautiful, on-brand visuals with high attention to detail
* Support or contribute to 
 **digital and omnichannel campaigns** 
  where needed
* Create visual storytelling for campaigns, new product launches, and promotional initiatives across physical and digital touchpoints
* **Collaborate with other designers** 
 , review their work, and 
 **ensure a consistently high standard of design quality** 
  across deliverables



  





**Who you are** 




  




* A
 **designer** 
  with at least 
 **3 years of experience** 
  in graphic design, art direction, or retail marketing – preferably within an agency or in-house creative team
* Skilled in 
 **retail design and in-store communication** 
 , including POS materials, signage, and window/display campaigns
* Expert proficiency in 
 **Adobe InDesign** 
 , with strong skills in other Creative Cloud tools
* A 
 **keen eye for design, layout, typography, and branding** 
  – with an ability to translate strategy into stunning visuals
* Ideally, you have 
 **some digital experience** 
  and are not afraid to jump into 
 **Figma** 
  or support digital campaigns and presentations
* A 
 **self-starter** 
  with a service mindset – you enjoy collaborating and solving problems creatively, always with the brand and end-user in mind
* An
 **organized individual** 
 who doesn't shy away from structure, project management and task delegation



  





**Who we are** 



* A young and growing agency founded by experienced creatives and digital professionals, with 
 **global clients from day one**
* A culture of 
 **openness, creativity, and trust** 
  – we support each other and believe in lifting others up
* A 
 **flexible work environment** 
  where you set your own schedule around responsibilities. We trust you to deliver!

title: UX/UI designer, Solna
company_industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
Be a part of creating the digital customer experiences of the future with us at PostNord. Join the UX design team in Stockholm!
   

  

 Join the UX team at PostNord and help shape outstanding customer journeys with a user-centered mindset. As a UX/UI designer, you’ll collaborate with fellow designers within a dedicated user segment, working on multiple services to create seamless and impactful experiences.
   

  

 Join us
   

  

 We, the UX team, are working in an agile environment where the teams independently owns the product from start to finish. Within the team, it is important that everybody has their say, and we always strive to improve our way of working.
   

  

 Our head office is in Solna, Stockholm
 ***.***
 We make sure to meet each other in our office in Solna, at least three days per week.
   

  

 Find out more and follow us on LinkedIn!
   

  

 ,
   

  

 To be successful in this role, we believe that you are a UX/UI designer that wants to be a key player and take ownership. You will work closely with business, product owners, developers and other UX designers and make sure we build the best customer journeys.
   

  

 As a person, we believe that you are full of initiative and solution oriented. You have good communication skills and thrive when you get to work both practically and close to our users. You are no stranger with facilitating meetings or workshops and visualizing requirements. You have great knowledge and experience in designing for web and native applications for iOS/Android.
   

  

 You have a great personal drive and adapt efficiently to new information and insights. Like us, you value teamwork and building great solutions together.
   

  

 Your profile
   

  

* Relevant education in UX design, interaction design, service design or equivalent field.
* Minimum 3 years of work experience as a UX/UI designer
* Facilitation skills and able to take ownership and get things done
* Design user flows and interfaces for our digital services in Figma
* The ability to analyze and design user flows based on insights collected via interviews and other mediums such as Hotjar/Google Analytics
* Experience in designing user interfaces for both web and native apps
* Understands graphic design and typography
* Understands designing for accessibility and WCAG requirements
* Experience in planning and conducting user tests
* Fluent Swedish and English


 Job Responsibilities
   

  

* Conducting user research, both qualitative and quantitative, as well as analyzing and presenting insights to revenant product teams and the whole department
* Analyzing and following up on user research
* Designing overall user flows and interfaces for our digital services on the web
* Working closely with product owners, other designers and other stakeholders within PostNord
* You’ll be responsible in aligning your work with other UX designers and user segments, on how it might affect PostNord’s multiple customer journeys.


**We offer you**
* A great team, you are part of a team with a focus on creating amazing customer-facing solutions at Postnord.
* Agile is our way of working, we have weekly’s, daily's, refinement meetings and sprint retros.
* Flexible hybrid workplace with an open working climate.
* To be part of a large organization with endless development opportunities for you as a UX designer and individual.
* Good insurance and occupational pension conditions.
* Wellness allowance and access to office gym and swimming pool.
* Employee benefits through PostNord's own employee foundation PostNord Plus.
* Employment according to a collective agreement.


 We make everyday life easier
   

  

 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are accountable, brave and committed, effectively leading change regardless of if we lead ourselves or others. We emphasize teamwork, sincerity and positive relationships in the workplace. We build on our success and learn from both colleagues and mistakes. People with different backgrounds work with us. You will therefore be part of a workplace with great diversity, which contributes to better results for the business. Visit us at www.postnord.com.
   

  

  

  

  

  

  

  

  

  

  

  

 Apply
   

  

  

  

  

  

 What are you waiting for? Send your application. Selection is ongoing, so apply as soon as possible. If you have any questions about the position, email sonja.prest@postnord.com. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Product Manager
description:
**Juni who? 👋**
 At Juni, we’re busy building the future of banking. We want to help businesses do more with less and get access to the financial tools they need to operate, grow, and win globally.
   

  

**How & Why We Do It 🚀**
 We give our people the same thing we’re building for our customers: freedom. Freedom to be 100% yourself. Freedom to explore your potential and what’s more – make the most of it. We truly believe we’re making the world a better place for online businesses, and we want you to be a part of that mission.
   

  

**Your role at a glance 🤸‍♀️**
 You'll work closely with designers, engineers, specialist stakeholders, and the Product director to develop consumer facing products, which form a core part of our platform and value proposition. You will act as the voice of our customers and be a stable bridge between engineering and the business. You will also help the team function as an empowered product team by setting the right product culture and vision, and help the team deliver high quality impactful features.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities 👏**
 In this role, you’ll stand over the one of the exciting product suite at Juni. Your R&R would cover:
   

  

* Product Strategy and Vision: Defining the strategic direction of your area, aligning them with the company's overall business strategy. This involves creating product roadmaps that outline planned features and enhancements based on customer feedback, competitors, market demands and business priorities.
* Customer Experience: Lead the vision for financial experience within the platform- bank transfer, invoice payment, credit usage etc. Ensure the financial and banking features are chain-linked into cohesive end-to-end workflows. Work with designers to build UX that WoWs customers.
* Empowered Product Team: Setting the right product culture within your product team that empowers all team members to empathise with customer pain points and understand the impact of features they are building.
* Customer Research: Conduct thorough customer research to understand customer (ICP) needs, market trends, and the competitive landscape. This includes gathering insights through customer interviews, surveys, and data analysis.
* Cross-functional collaboration: Working closely with various departments such as engineering, design, commercial, and finance to ensure effective product development and launch. This includes facilitating communication and alignment among different teams.
* Product Development Oversight: Managing the product backlog, prioritizing features, and working closely with development teams to ensure timely and high-quality delivery of banking products
* Market Positioning and training: Developing strategies for positioning and pricing products in the market. Ensuring that the commercial teams have been trained on product features and value propositions clearly understood by all.


**Within 1 Month You Will**
* Understand how Juni’s product teams work
* Be integrated with your team
* Ship your first features 🚢


**Within 3 Months You Will Have**
* Stronghold of your teams' growth metrics
* Deep understanding of your team’s roadmap
* Shipped many features and fix critical bugs 🐛


**Within 6 Months You Will**
* Oversee delivery against your metrics and roadmap (with some bumps along the way)
* Set 12-month rolling vision for your product domain
* Actively participate in customer research to understand the voice of customer


**Tooling ⚙️**
* Google suite
* Notion
* BI tools
* Slack


**Qualifications 👑**
 What we need to see:
   

  

* Familiarity with fintech and financial services (preferably from Sweden)
* Experience in activation, onboarding, pricing
* Good understanding of Swedish and global payment eco-system
* 3+ years of product manager experience


**What We’d Love To See**
* Experience in working with sales, onboarding and credit teams
* 5+ years of overall experience
* Engineering or computer science degree


**Your people 👥**
 Our team is as ambitious as our amazing customers. We aim high and we move with speed to make our vision a reality. We care deeply about building a better future for our customers and each other. Here, you can work with people at the top of their game and who didn’t get there by playing games. You can help us create a whole new category in financial services.
   

  

**Your Benefits 😍**
 We’re freedom-first. Transparent. Caring. Empowering. So our benefits are too.
   

  

* We work hybrid. We'll see you in one of our offices in Stockholm or Gothenburg at least two days per week.
* Swap 2D for 3D. Meet all Junis IRL at the company onsite each year.
* Diversity is at our core. We're part Swedish. Part Canadian. Part French. Part Indian. Part Italian. Part British. Part Portuguese. You get the idea.
* Great players can stay great players. Progress your career whether you choose to manage people or not.
* Stock options. We can’t promise you’ll make a fortune. But we’ll give it our very best shot.
* Vacation days. 30 days contractually. Awesome.
* Private Health insurance. You know. Just in case
* Beautiful offices in central Gothenburg and Stockholm, front row sea view!


 At Juni, we’re building the future of banking. We want to help businesses do more with less and get access to the financial tools they need to operate, grow, and win globally.

title: Praktikanter - ansök här!
description:
Bizkit Havas är en fullservicebyrå som består av tre delar: Media, Creative och Insight. Media hjälper våra kunder med strategier inom kommunikation, media, data och digitala lösningar, samt mediaplanering och -köp, performance marketing, programmatiska köp, SEM och sociala medier. Creative skapar och utformar reklamkoncept och kampanjer, producerar material, skapar 3D-produktioner, rörligt material, designar UX-hemsidor och mycket mer. Insight hanterar analys och rapportering, målgruppsdata och insikter, olika typer av mätningar och undersökningar. Insight är experter på strategi och insikt, trender och kartläggningar inom medievärlden.
   

  

 Vi jobbar med kunder som Kia, SJ, Scan och Red Bull. Vi sitter i härliga ljusa lokaler på Gamla Brogatan i centrala Stockholm, precis vid Hötorget och är 50 anställda. Vi är en del av det globala nätverket Havas och har därmed tillgång till alla verktyg och kompetens som det innebär. Vi är vana vid att ta emot praktikanter och ser det som en tillgång för oss samtidigt som studenten får en givande och spännande arbetsplats för sin praktikperiod.
   

  

 Skicka in din ansökan till oss! Vi tar emot praktikanter löpande. Om du har ytterligare frågor, hör av dig till HR jenny.kurki@bizkithavas.se

title: Data Analyst - User Identity
description:
Schibsted Media is at a pivotal point in our strategy. After splitting the company in two parts - Marketplaces (now Vend) and Media - we are embarking with a new way of working ing developing top of the line Media products that more than 6M people love every day.
   

  

 Data is at the heart of building products people love - and we are also changing how we work with data. We are building a modern data foundation that supports smarter personalization, user engagement, and monetization across our media brands.
   

  

 We are now looking for a
 **Data Analyst** 
 to join our User Data team in Stockholm.
   

  

**What will you do in this role?**
 In this role, you will work embedded with our user identity product team which is responsible for our cookie consent, login and identity solutions - alla critical in Schibsted's data collection
   

  

 You will:
   

  

* Turn raw events into clarity - Model and analyze login funnels, MFA drop-offs, password-reset loops, and consent acceptance rates
* Own the metrics - Define and maintain source-of-truth dashboards for login success, speed, satisfaction, and op-in health
* Spot friction fast - Proactively surface anomalies (e.g. spikes in 2FA failures) and partner with engineering to test fixes or new flows
* Drive experimentation - Design A/B tests on copy, CTA placement, or step order; measure impact on conversion, engagement and retention
* Champion data literacy - Enable self-serve analytics for product and editorial stakeholders; coach teams on reading dashboards and setting KPIs
* Keep us compliant - Work with Privacy, Legal, and Data Gocernance to make sure consent metrics reflect GDPR and local regulations


 ,
   

  

**Who you are:**
 You enjoy analysing data and always link insights to an outcome. To you, data is not just rows and columns, but actually journeys and drivers. You are energized by seeing a 0.5-second faster login or a 3 pp rise in consent opt-ins—and you will chase the next win together with your team.
   

  

 You are curious and collaborative, eager to understand root causes and explore them with your PM, engineer and UX-designer to continuously improve our products.
   

  

**What we are looking for:**
 You have experience as a product owner, analyst, or data-savvy project manager, and you know what it takes to develop great data products in complex organizations.
   

  

* 2-4 years of experience in data analytics, product analytics, or growth analytics for consumer-facing digital products
* Advanced SQL skills and comfort exploring millions of events in Snowflake (or similar cloud DWH)
* Fluency in Tableau, Amplitude, or equivalent BI tools. You can craft intuituve dashboards and narrate the "so what"
* Working knowledge of experiment design and statistical evaluation
* Curiosity about authentication stacks (SSO, OAuth/OIDC, MFA) and a basic grasp of GDPR/Consent frameworks
* You are a clear communicator who can switch from SQL to storytelling and make data feel human
* Bonus points for experience with Python, R, DBT or Airflow


**Why we enjoy working here:**
 At Schibsted, we value openness, curiosity, and collaboration. You will be part of a diverse, inclusive workplace that encourages bold thinking and continuous learning. Our work directly supports public interest journalism—and we take that responsibility seriously.
   

  

 Whether you are enabling better content decisions, driving user personalization, or shaping experimentation at scale, your contributions will help shape the future of digital media in the Nordics.
   

  

 You will be joining a collaborative, impact-driven team that works across disciplines like technology, product, and editorial. We believe in structured yet flexible ways of working, balancing clear ownership with strong teamwork. Curiosity, openness, and a drive to create value through data are at the heart of how we operate. We support each other, celebrate continuous learning, and are passionate about turning complex challenges into meaningful solutions for our users and brands.
   

  

**Application process:**
 Please apply for this position by sharing your CV with us and a letter of motivation. English is our corporate language, but you are welcome to write it in Swedish or Norwegian. Selection of candidates takes place on an ongoing basis during the process.

title: Product Analyst - Mobility
description:
**THE OPPORTUNITY IN A NUTSHELL**
**You?** 
 You have 3+ years of experience as a product analyst in e-commerce, digital product or marketplace companies. You have experience working with modern data stacks, behavioural analysis and experimentation. You thrive in a fast-changing environment and are good at connecting with colleagues both online and offline. Having a passion for cars, boats, and motorcycles is a plus.
   

  

**Role?** 
 You will empower the Product teams to make data-driven decisions and drive product development through insights, instrumentation and experimentation.
   

  

**Tech stack?** 
 Essential skills: Tableau, Amplitude, SQL, Snowflake, Google Slides, A/B testing. Bonus skills/experience: dbt, Python, Kafka, Data Mesh principles, Machine Learning and Large Language Model.
   

  

**Location?** 
 Work hybrid, spending a few days a week at our modern offices in Stockholm, Oslo, or Aarhus to promote team collaboration. Prefer an office environment? You’re welcome to join us daily.
   

  

**Company?** 
 We empower people to make smart choices for themselves and future generations through our leading and loved marketplace brands across the Nordics: Blocket, Bytbil and Wheelaway in Sweden. FINN and Nettbil in Norway. DBA and Bilbasen in Denmark. Tori and Autovex in Finland. Combined, our marketplaces receive 100M monthly visits, generating billions of behavioural data points. Currently, we’re in a historic change, consolidating to a common marketplace platform across the Nordics.
   

  

**The team?** 
 You will join the Mobility Insight & Analytics team. We are a team of six product and business analysts and one data scientist, who are based across the Nordics. We support product teams and business stakeholders within the Mobility vertical i.e., Cars, Boats and Motorcycles. We collaborate closely with data platform teams e.g. Data Engineers, Data Modelling Teams, and the horizontal Insight & Analytics team.
   

  

**Why us?** 
 In this role, you will have the opportunity to make a meaningful impact. We hold strong, unique positions across all our segments in the Nordics. Specifically, the Mobility vertical is driving transformation in electrification and the online buying experience, creating a dynamic environment full of opportunities. At our core, we unite across countries, brands, and teams, embracing a culture where we dare to speak up, challenge the status quo, and try new things. We take pride in delivering on our promises and turning bold ideas into real impact.
   

  

**Sounds like your cup of tea? Check out the details below!**
**WHO ARE YOU?**
 You build strong relationships with colleagues and stakeholders. You communicate data and insights in an engaging and visual way and switch between details and overviews to navigate complex business landscapes. You turn vast data into actionable insights, elevating our understanding of marketplace user behaviour.
   

  

**WHAT'S THE JOB LIKE?**
* Analyze and understand user journeys using product analytics tools
* Advise on hypotheses and insight needs for product development
* Facilitate analytics needs for organizational transformation and product migration
* Identify and advise on data needs, like missing events or data points
* Help set up (with tech) and analyze experiments
* Advise on prioritizing outputs to help reach product goals
* Monitor product performance and vertical user metrics
* Work in cross-functional teams (e.g., developers, product managers, and UX) to develop the product
* Advise stakeholders on setting product KPIs, tracking them, and using them


**What We Offer**
 At Vend, we offer a range of benefits designed to support your well-being, professional growth and work-life balance. Note that specific benefits may vary by office location.
   

  

* Learning & Development: Access to Vend Learning Lab, external courses, conferences, Hackdays, and leadership development programs
* Health & Wellbeing: Comprehensive health insurance, mental health support, and access to gym facilities, physiotherapy, and sports interest groups. Discounts on fitness memberships
* Parental & Sick Leave: Enhanced parental leave benefits, full salary during illness for up to one year, and additional leave days
* Pension & Insurance: Defined contribution pension plans and extensive insurance coverage, including accident, critical illness, and travel insurance
* Food & Social Activities: Subsidized healthy meals, barista coffee, and various social events like after-work, gatherings, holiday parties, and family activities
* Employee Share Saving Plan: Opportunity to buy shares with additional complimentary shares after two years
* Holiday Homes: Access to holiday homes for rent at popular destinations
* Home Office Support: Office equipment for home office setup, including a monthly compensation for extra expenses


**GOT YOUR ATTENTION?**
 Apply as soon as possible to this role where you can share knowledge, learn, grow, and make a difference. We value diversity and welcome applicants from all backgrounds. Inclusion for us means creating a fair workspace where each of us is respected, celebrated for who we are, and given equal opportunities to thrive.
